value.subject: Thank you for applying to {{COMPANY}}
value.name: Default Candidate Auto Reply
value.html_body:
{{CANDIDATE_FIRST_NAME}},

Thanks for applying to {{COMPANY}}. Your application has been received and we will review it right away.

If your application seems like a good fit for the position we will contact you soon.

Regards,
{{COMPANY}}

** Please note: Do not reply to this email. This email is sent from an unattended mailbox. Replies will not be read.

value.subject: Important information about your application to {{COMPANY}}
value.name: Default Candidate Rejection
value.html_body:
{{CANDIDATE_FIRST_NAME}},

Unfortunately, we have decided not to proceed with your candidacy for the current opening at {{COMPANY}}.

We received many qualified applicants and have decided to move ahead with another candidate who we feel is a better match for this particular position.

Thanks again for your interest in {{COMPANY}} and we wish you luck in your search.

Regards,
{{COMPANY}}

value.subject: REMINDER: Please fill out your scorecard for {{CANDIDATE_NAME}}
value.name: Default Scorecard Reminder
value.html_body:
Hello,

It's been {{TIME_SINCE_INTERVIEWED}} since you completed your interview with {{CANDIDATE_NAME}}.

We know that feedback quality gets worse the longer you wait to submit. In fact, one hour after the event, memory recall declines to 44%.

Submit your feedback now to help us make the right hiring decision – {{SCORECARD_LINK}}

Your feedback is important! Thanks for your help.

value.subject: Interview {{CANDIDATE_NAME}}
value.name: Default Interviewer Invite

value.subject: {{MY_FULL_NAME}} has invited you to Greenhouse
value.name: Default Site Admin Welcome Message
value.html_body:
Hi,

{{MY_FULL_NAME}} has invited you to join Greenhouse, the hiring operating system helping {{COMPANY}} get better at hiring.

Let's get started. Use this link to access your account.

Your invite will expire in 7 days. If you need a new link, ask your Site Admin to resend your invitation email.

To learn more about how Greenhouse Recruiting helps create more structured hiring, take a look at our resources on Learn Greenhouse. You can take a course, view a quick video, or join us for office hours and get any questions you may have answered by an expert.

Happy hiring,

The Greenhouse Team
app.greenhouse.io

Questions? Visit our support center for further support.
© 2024 Greenhouse / 18 West 18th Street, 11th Floor, New York, NY 10011, USA

value.subject: We have received your referral of {{CANDIDATE_NAME}} to {{JOB_NAME}}
value.name: Default Candidate Referral Receipt
value.html_body:
{{CANDIDATE_NAME}} has been submitted to {{JOB_NAME}}.

Recruiter: {{RECRUITER}}
Coordinator: {{COORDINATOR}}

{{DUPLICATE_WARNING}}

Click here to see all your referrals: {{MY_REFERRALS_URL}}

value.subject: We have received your referral of {{CANDIDATE_NAME}} as a prospect
value.name: Default Prospect Referral Receipt
value.html_body:
{{CANDIDATE_NAME}} has been submitted as a prospect.

{{DUPLICATE_WARNING}}

Click here to see all your referrals: {{MY_REFERRALS_URL}}

value.subject: {{COMPANY}} Interview Availability
value.name: Default Candidate Availability Request Message
value.html_body:
{{CANDIDATE_FIRST_NAME}},

Thanks for your interest in the {{JOB_NAME}} position at {{COMPANY}}. We're excited to move forward with the interview process.

To help us schedule your next interview(s), please let us know when you're available by selecting the online calendar link below.

{{AVAILABILITY_SUBMISSION_LINK}}

We'll coordinate with our team and confirm a time with you.

Regards,
{{MY_FIRST_NAME}}

value.subject: Information Request for {{COMPANY}}
value.name: Default Job Post Request
value.html_body:
{{CANDIDATE_FIRST_NAME}},

Thanks for your interest in the {{JOB_NAME}} position at {{COMPANY}}. Since we do not have a formal application from you on file, we have a few outstanding questions for you.

Please use this link to submit additional information: {{SUBMISSION_LINK}}

Regards,
{{MY_FIRST_NAME}}

value.subject: GDPR Notification from {{COMPANY}}
value.name: Default GDPR Notification
value.html_body: Use this template to draft language that will automatically be sent to candidates whose data you are collecting from other sources (not the candidates themselves) to comply with Art. 14 of GDPR. For more information, please visit our help center: https://support.greenhouse.io/hc/en-us/articles/360002038211

value.subject: {{COMPANY}} Interview Confirmation
value.name: Default Candidate Interview Confirmation Message
value.html_body:
{{CANDIDATE_FIRST_NAME}},

Thanks for submitting your availability for the {{JOB_NAME}} position.

You're confirmed for your interview on:

{{INTERVIEW_SCHEDULE}}

Let us know if you have any other questions before your interview.

Thanks,
{{MY_FIRST_NAME}}

value.subject: Invitation to Self Identify (Voluntary)
value.name: Default Eeoc Data Request
value.html_body:
Thank you for your interest in {{JOB_NAME}} at {{COMPANY}}.

For government reporting purposes, we ask candidates to respond to the below self-identification survey. Completion of the form is entirely voluntary. Whatever your decision, it will not be considered in the hiring process or thereafter. Any information that you do provide will be recorded and maintained in a confidential file.

As set forth in {{COMPANY}}’s Equal Employment Opportunity policy, we do not discriminate on the basis of any protected group status under any applicable law.

Thank You

value.subject: Thank you for attending {{EVENT_NAME}}
value.name: Default Event Prospect Auto Reply
value.html_body:
{{CANDIDATE_FIRST_NAME}},

Thank you for attending {{EVENT_NAME}}. If you haven't already submitted a resume or would like to upload a high resolution version of your resume, you can do so here: {{RESUME_UPLOAD_LINK}}.

Regards,
{{COMPANY}}

** Please note: Do not reply to this email. This email is sent from an unattended mailbox. Replies will not be read.

value.subject: {{CANDIDATE_NAME}} was moved into {{STAGE_NAME}}
value.name: Default Stage Change Notification For Followers
value.html_body: {{CANDIDATE_NAME}}, whom you are following in Greenhouse, was moved into {{STAGE_NAME}} for {{JOB_NAME}} by {{ACTING_USER}}.

value.subject: Status change for {{CANDIDATE_NAME}}
value.name: Default Rejection Notification For Followers
value.html_body: This is an automated message to alert you to a status change of {{CANDIDATE_NAME}}, a candidate whom you are following in Greenhouse. Please know that the hiring team has decided not to move forward with this candidate's application for {{JOB_NAME}}. Please be mindful that the candidate may not have been notified yet or could still be active on other roles. We recommend reaching out to the hiring team with any questions.

value.subject: {{COMPANY}} Interview Request
value.name: Default Request Interview with Calendly
value.html_body:
{{CANDIDATE_FIRST_NAME}},

Thanks for your interest in the {{JOB_NAME}} position at {{COMPANY}}. We're excited to move forward with the interview process.

To help us schedule your next interview(s), please select a time through the Calendly link below.

Regards,
{{MY_FIRST_NAME}}

value.subject: GDPR Notification from {{COMPANY}}
value.name: Default GDPR Consent Extension
value.html_body: Use this template to draft language that will automatically be sent to candidates whose data you would like to keep for an additional retention period. Consider consulting with your legal department on this copy.

value.subject: {{COMPANY}} assigned you to the {{JOB_NAME}} job
value.name: Default Agency Job Assignment Notification
value.html_body:
Hi,

{{MY_FULL_NAME}} from {{COMPANY}} has assigned you to the {{JOB_NAME}} job. You can now view this job and submit candidates to it in Agencies.

Log in here to get started: app.greenhouse.io

The Greenhouse Team
app.greenhouse.io

P.S. Need help powering your sourcing efforts? Check out Interseller (acquired by Greenhouse) - a sourcing and outreach platform built for recruiting agencies like yours.

© 2024 Greenhouse / 18 West 18th Street, 11th Floor, New York, NY 10011, USA

value.subject: Schedule your interview with {{COMPANY}}
value.name: Default Candidate Self-Schedule request
value.html_body:
Hi {{CANDIDATE_FIRST_NAME}},

Please use this link to schedule your interview: {{INTERVIEW_REQUEST_LINK}}

Regards,
{{MY_FIRST_NAME}}

value.subject: We want to know what you think
value.name: Default Candidate Survey
value.html_body:
Hi {{CANDIDATE_FIRST_NAME}},

{{COMPANY}} takes care to ensure that its recruiting process is well run and candidates have a great experience.

We're sending you this survey to gather some honest, anonymous feedback about your recent interview. No personal information about you will be seen by {{COMPANY}} - all survey results are anonymized.

Please take a moment to give us your feedback and tell us what you think could be improved about the process.

{{CANDIDATE_SURVEY_LINK}}

Sincerely,
Greenhouse
